metadata.title: 200g lentils and 1 sweet potato! I make it almost every week! Simple and delicious lentil recipe!
metadata.description:
200g lentils and 1 sweet potato! Simple, easy and delicious lentil recipe! One of the easiest lentil recipes  with sweet potatoes everyone can make at home! It tastes better than meat and the result is amazing! My whole family and friends like it so much and always ask me to cook more! Watch the video and learn the new way how to cook lentils! Everyone will be delighted with this vegan dish taste! Happy cooking and wishing you a wonderful day! üòä üíñ

üí¨ Let me know in the comments if you enjoy my vegan recipes.

‚ù§Ô∏è SUBSCRIBE to see new recipes: https://www.youtube.com/c/WeCookVegan?sub_confirmation=1

‚ÑπÔ∏è Serves 4. 
‚úÖ Gluten-free recipe

ü•£  ingredients:
7oz | 200g | 1 cup yellow  lentils
1 medium sweet potato
green onions
2 garlic cloves
8oz | 250ml | 1 cup non-dairy milk

Seasoning:
1/2tsp Korean chilli flakes (Gochugaru) - optional
1/2tsp Italian herbs
Season with salt
1/2tsp garlic powder
1/4tsp turmeric powder
1/2tsp onion powder
1tsp baking powder
Tomato sauce
Chopped parsley

üßë‚Äçüç≥Cooking tips: 
‚ùóFeel free to add your favourite herbs and spices to the recipe to get your favourite flavour. 
‚ùóYou can substitute Korean chilli flakes (gochugaru)for  crushed red pepper flakes or cayenne pepper.

‚úÖ‚ÑπÔ∏èOn my vegan recipes channel you will find many more easy budget recipes!  You will learn how to cook delicious plant based dishes with little time and on a budget with ingredients anyone can afford.

‚ù§Ô∏èMy friends if you like this video you can help to grow and develop the channel:

Rate the video üëç

WRITE A COMMENT, ask me a question and share your cooking ideas! I will be more than happy to answer all your comments. 

Thank you so much for watching my video and see you again soon! üíö üòä üíñ

#recipe #vegan #lentils #sweetpotato

core_summary.core_concepts: This video presents a simple and delicious vegan recipe featuring lentils and sweet potatoes, aimed at making cooking accessible and enjoyable for everyone.
key_insights: Lentils and sweet potatoes create a hearty vegan dish.
The recipe is budget-friendly and gluten-free.
Viewers are encouraged to customize the dish with their favorite herbs and spices.

recipes.name: Lentil and Sweet Potato Dish (Lentilles et Patate Douce)
recipes.cook_time: Approximately 5 minutes prep, total time 10 minutes
key_steps: Rinse and cook the lentils according to package instructions.
Peel and cube the sweet potato, then add to the lentils during cooking.
Add the garlic and seasonings to the mixture before serving.
tips: Feel free to add your favorite herbs and spices for additional flavor.
Substitute Korean chilli flakes with crushed red pepper flakes or cayenne pepper if preferred.

preparation_tips: Ensure lentils are rinsed well before cooking.
Sweet potatoes can be cubed for quicker cooking.
cooking_notes.storage_info: Store leftovers in an airtight container in the refrigerator.
